metadata.description: Randal Howard Paul wins 2028 Republican presidential nomination

outcome_space.description: Who will win the 2028 Republican Presidential Nomination?

base_case.fsp_resolution: FSP = 1 if {outcome} is formally nominated as the Republican Party's presidential candidate at the 2028 Republican National Convention. FSP = 0 if any other candidate is nominated or no nomination occurs by December 31, 2028. Primary sources: Republican National Committee official announcements and official 2028 Republican National Convention proceedings. Secondary sources: major news outlets (AP, Reuters, NYT, WSJ).

edge_cases.condition: Convention cancelled or postponed beyond December 31, 2028
{outcome} nominated but dies or withdraws before general election
Multiple ballots with no clear nominee by convention end (August 31, 2028)

_comment: This is a canonical example. The extendedMetadata CID is for example purposes only and does not reference actual IPFS content. In production, this would be the CID of the pinned outcome_space and outcome_point JSON above.

oracle_config.description: Manual oracle system for product settlement
